\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[e1c4def84ffe9a7c4690672c77957a06]%mdk

%mdk-data-line={65}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[64f17cc7b139f656b9de7b270e70a486]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={67}
\E[Eve_{\Pi}(1^{2n})] = \E_{s \gets \zo^n}[D^{p_s(\cdot)}(1^n)]
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={69}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[4aa2ff5f6258ea3efebd3d4cd4668be8]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={71}
|\E[D^{p(\cdot)}(1^n)] -  \E_{s \gets \zo^n}[D^{p_s(\cdot)}(1^n)] | = |\E[Eve_{\Pi_R}(1^n)] - \E[Eve_{\Pi}(1^n)] | > p(n)
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={77}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[d7c5245954dfceffbd1f6a652a7e6136]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={79}
\E[Eve'_{\Pi_R}(1^{2n})] = \frac{1}{2} + \frac{4T(n)}{2^n}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={81}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[2e63b240624fa3b4c93345b802d38968]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={83}
\begin{aligned}
\E[Eve'_{\Pi}(1^{2n})] &= |\E[Eve'_{\Pi}(1^{2n})]  - \E[Eve'_{\Pi_R}(1^{2n})] + \E[Eve'_{\Pi_R}(1^{2n})]  | \\
&\leq \frac{1}{2} + \frac{4T(n)}{2} + \epsilon(n)
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[fcdc786cf0502bd7697f036c9795f799]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={174}
\begin{aligned}
\E[Eve_{\Pi_r}(1^{2n})] &= \E[D^{p(\cdot)(1^n)}] \\
\E[Eve_{\Pi}(1^{2n})] &= \E_{s \gets \zo^n} [D^{p_s(\cdot)}(1^n)]
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={179}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[4aa2ff5f6258ea3efebd3d4cd4668be8]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={181}
|\E[D^{p(\cdot)}(1^n)] -  \E_{s \gets \zo^n}[D^{p_s(\cdot)}(1^n)] | = |\E[Eve_{\Pi_R}(1^n)] - \E[Eve_{\Pi}(1^n)] | > p(n)
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[b8642ff3d4e361db2d9731400c4863db]%mdk
$\frac{4}{2^n}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={219}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[959dd78a45273f77672f45dac7c226de]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={222}
\Pr[Collision] = \sum_{i=1}^{T(n)} \Pr[Collision_i] = \frac{4T(n)}{2^n}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={224}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[d7c5245954dfceffbd1f6a652a7e6136]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={226}
\E[Eve'_{\Pi_R}(1^{2n})] = \frac{1}{2} + \frac{4T(n)}{2^n}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={229}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[0c3570ae86ed9d695d5d1d469a0b8bfa]%mdk
$Eve'$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={229}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[5722356db87a884897342f10ed1149c9]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={231}
\begin{aligned}
\E[Eve_{\Pi}(1^{2n})] &= |\E[Eve_{\Pi}(1^{2n})] - \E[Eve_{\Pi_R}(1^{2n})] + \E[Eve_{\Pi_R}(1^{2n})]| \\
&\leq |\E[Eve_{\Pi}(1^{2n})] - \E[Eve_{\Pi_R}(1^{2n})]| + \E[Eve_{\Pi_R}(1^{2n})] \\
&= \frac{1}{2} + \frac{4T(n)}{2^n} +  \epsilon(n)
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={237}

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[cc1784df219b5f60fc351c3c720645b1]%mdk
$\frac{1}{2^n}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={317}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[a095d84685232358c12a89aac848c776]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={321}
\begin{aligned}
\Pr[Success] &= \Pr[Success \mid c^* \neq c']\Pr[c^* \neq c'] + \Pr[Success \mid c^* = c']\Pr[c^* = c']  \\
&= 1 - \frac{1}{2^n} + \frac{1}{2^{n+1}} \\
&= 1 - \frac{1}{2^{n+1}} \\
&= \frac{1}{2} + \frac{2^n - 1}{2^{n+1}}
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={328}
